item.description:
Back by popular demand, it is time for another Boston PHP job fair.

Here's a link to a quick video from a Boston PHP job fair we hosted in 2011:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QSshCddvgUw
(Sorry about the sound but it was super busy and loud at the event) 

We've heard lots of great stories from people who have found jobs and from companies who have hired new team members at our job fairs. Our job fairs have become some of our most popular events.

Are you a web developer, web designer, or specialist looking for a job? Maybe even a little part time project off to the side? Or perhaps you are a company and have positions you are looking to hire? Maybe you need help on a side project and willing to pay someone to help? Or you just want to circulate your resume.

This event helps unite the folks looking for work with companies and teams looking to hire. If you are looking for work, you can take the podium for a few minutes to pitch your unique skills and qualifications. Companies and teams looking to hire can have the podium as well to pitch their job openings and opportunities. If you missed out on our last job fair, you won't want to miss this one.

  • Meet others in your profession
  • Find candidates for your job profile quickly
  • Get your business cards out there
  • Get overviews of all the great jobs out there
  • Eat free pizza

Become a sponsor and get your own table/booth:
There are lots of benefits to getting involved and sponsoring the Job fair. Contact us to inquire about getting a booth. Send an email to matt@bostonphp.org.

  • Get your own table at our event
  • Get your jobs in front of a huge group of attendees
  • Help support your non profit Boston PHP community (& free pizza)

Enjoy the after show...
Join us at 7PM after the job fair for our talk on Solution Design: The Hidden Side of UX with Joe Baz. (This is set up as a separate event with a separate RSVP list)

Agenda:

6PM - 7PM  Job Fair

7PM - 9PM Solution Design: The Hidden Side of UX with Joe Baz

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the first floor meeting space
item.name: Boston PHP Job Fair
